attributes.action: Amend the Dangerous Dogs Act 1991 by including more dog breeds to be banned
attributes.additional_details:
There have been too many dog attacks, including those resulting in the death of a person, involving some of these breeds.
 
We believe banning breeding and owning dogs of these breeds would help improve public safety.
attributes.background: Amend current list of banned dog breeds (currently 4) by adding the following breeds: American Bully - all kinds (XL, Extreme, Pocket, Standard, Classic), Staffordshire Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, American Pit Bull Terrier, Bull Terrier (incl. Miniature).
